sg: Consider adding rolling summaries to tester case block for consistency
QA plan_summaries could include test pass/fail counts inline
desc: Implemented rolling summaries (T-1) and error recovery context (CG-4) in compile-context.sh. Dev/Senior get prior plan summaries + error recovery from gaps.jsonl. QA/QA-code get all-plan summaries + test-results. 13 BATS tests verify behavior.
